name: Non-Human Society
description:
My entry in #cyberpunkjam .Please rate :)

W,S,A,D - moving // left Shift - Run // r,-,+ - radar and zoom // q,e - turns camera // space - Shot (after obtaining handgun) //

HOW TO PLAY:
1. You are infiltrator and not a tank - hide and run from your enemies when possible.
1. You don't have a weapon from the beginning so you must find secret stash using radar ("r" or icon in upper-right corner).
2. Your main mission objective is to find and assassinate important enemy scientist
3. Evacuate using main city gate

Good Luck! : )

ps: if you want you can change control scheme (2 presets) clicking on the small button in upper left corner of the screen.
